subtitle: Parabolic SAR — trend following stop/exit indicator.

measures.how_to_read: Dots below price indicate uptrend; above indicate downtrend. Flips can be exit cues.
measures.caveats: Sensitive to sudden reversals; use as trailing guide, not sole entry.

beginner_summary: Parabolic SAR — trend following stop/exit indicator.
assistant_hints: Works in trends, whipsaws in ranges.
Use as trailing stop, not entry.
